mutants.code:
def find_min_knowledge_difference(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        n = case[0]
        knowledge_levels = case[1:]
        knowledge_levels.sort()
        team_sums = []
        for i in range(n // 2):
            team_sums.append(knowledge_levels[i] + knowledge_levels[n - 1 - i])
        team_sums.sort()
        min_difference = team_sums[-1] + team_sums[0]
        results.append(min_difference)
    return results

def find_min_knowledge_difference(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        n = case[0]
        knowledge_levels = case[1:]
        knowledge_levels.sort()
        team_sums = []
        for i in range(n // 2):
            team_sums.append(knowledge_levels[i] + knowledge_levels[n - 1 - i])
        team_sums.sort()
        min_difference = team_sums[-1] * team_sums[0]
        results.append(min_difference)
    return results
